brief.image_brief: A split image or a before-and-after concept. On one side (problem), visualize 'wasted ad spend': a downward trending graph with red indicators, perhaps a stack of generic ad creatives with a red 'X' over them, implying poor performance. The background should feel cluttered or inefficient. On the other side (solution), visualize 'optimized spend' and 'high-ROI creatives': an upward trending graph with green indicators, a sleek digital dashboard showcasing positive performance metrics (ROI, conversions), and a hand interacting with an intuitive interface that suggests 'instant iteration'. The background should be clean and organized. Use a professional, clean aesthetic with brand colors (blue, black, white) to highlight data and efficiency. The overall impression should be a clear contrast between inefficiency and effective, data-driven optimization.

video_brief.hook: Wasting ad spend on underperforming creatives?

scenes.visual: Close-up on a digital performance report displaying red, negative metrics (e.g., high CPA, low ROI). A hand hovers over the screen, looking frustrated and stressed. The screen has a slightly chaotic or overwhelming feel.

Transition to a modern, clean SaaS dashboard interface (using blue, black, white). Animated elements show rapid A/B testing or creative variations being generated and analyzed in real-time. Green arrows and positive data points emerge, indicating improvement. A hand confidently interacts with the interface, suggesting ease of use.

A confident marketing manager smiles, looking at a screen displaying significant ROI growth and budget efficiency. A subtle visual of money growing or being saved, perhaps a green bar graph sharply rising. The overall scene conveys success and control.

video_brief.voiceover: Are you wasting valuable ad spend on underperforming creatives? Stop the guesswork. Instantly iterate and optimize your performance ads. Identify and scale high-ROI creatives, cutting wasted budget and boosting your bottom line.
